title: You Can Use Free Week Champions In Ranked.
body:
This wasn't listed anywhere as an intentional change that I could find so I'm assuming it's a bug. Right now you can pick a champion you don't own in ranked games if it's currently in the free week rotation.

Semi relatedly, but not a "bug," Vel'koz is easy to play and very powerful. :p

replies.body: Lol comments on something that involves letting people play with champs for free bc that costs them money, but wont respond to a customer who cant use chroma pack skins on new champ select, oh and they don't put them offline either while there is an issue. Weak management.

Read the "known issues" thread about the new queue. They're aware of the chroma issue and it will be fixed with the next patch.

You can play free week champions anywhere BUT ranked and as far as I can tell the majority of people who play mostly ranked don't want free week champions available in ranked. People playing champions they aren't good with is common enough without making it THAT easy. Also they gotta make money for the game to exist.

Yeah but free week champs shouldnt be for use in ranked  yes maybe you are good with some of them but the fact that you dont own does free champs means you are really not good at them and for that you shouldnt be allowed to use them why would i want someone using Gnar just bcus he is op yet they have no clue how to use him thats =  good game.

I just played a ranked game not the team one and I was hovering on draven who is a free to play champ that i dont own and It locked me in and I played the game as draven, subsequently not knowing what the hell I was doing on draven because I have never played him before i lost the game. For one kind of concerned that It auto locked me while I was just hovering over it wondering why it was there. And lost some lp to boot. :( :( :( :( :(

A free champ (that I don't own) showed up in champ select while scrolling through champions I could pick just now (in ranked) but I didn't think to click on it and certainly didn't want to lock it in this time so I'm not sure if it would let me. Unfortunately with this new rotation of champions I don't think there's any that I don't own that I'd be willing to play in ranked. xD The Vel'koz game was yesterday but that was Monday... Sorry.

Where did you get that icon?

[From the store.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/welcome-poro-masters-collection) Right. Downvote me now.

Yeah, I've been saying this with no response from rito...so I don't know if intended or not.

On a side note, I'm 3-1 with free week champs (only loss was due to afk the entire game).
